entry.title: Inala Health Umckaloabo Drops (Pelargonium sidoides)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Inala Health
Type: Herbal Tincture
Price: 110.00

Pure Umckaloabo Drops - For natural respiratory tract health! (50 ml)

Umckaloabo (Pelargonium sidoides) has been used for hundreds of years in traditional African medicine as a treatment for respiratory infections and lung complaints. Since the late 1800's, it has been recognised in Britain and Europe and is a must in any home medicine chest. Umckaloabo's efficacy as a natural antibiotic alternative has been supported in many studies. 

  • Used to relieve bronchitis, sinusitis and other respiratory tract infections and complaints
  • An safe antibiotic alternative for respiratory infections
  • A useful treatment for sore throat and swollen tonsils
  • Some studies suggest that Umckaoloba can help to relieve asthma symptoms
  • A strengthening tonic to guard against infection
  • A concentrated 100% natural whole herb tincture which is vegan friendly 

Ingredients

Inala Health Umckaloabo is a 100% natural concentrated full spectrum extract of Pelargonium sidoides. Ingredients: Pelargonium sidoides, Aqua, Ethanol (natural preservative and extracting agent)

Directions for use: Dilute in a little water or juice

Children under 12 years: 1 drop per age year of the child three times daily
Adults: 15 - 20 drops three times daily
Caution: Please consult your doctor should symptoms persist. Safety during pregnancy and breastfeeding has not been established. Please keep this and all medicines out of reach of children. 

    Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.

entry.title: Inala Health Buchu Drops (Agathosma betulina)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Inala Health
Type: Herbal Tincture
Price: 110.00

Pure Buchu extract - For detox and urinary tract health (50 ml)

Buchu (Agathosma betulina) is endemic to the mountains of the Western Cape in South Africa, where growing conditions are ideal for this herb. Buchu has been used in traditional Khoisan medicine for hundreds of years and is also a well-respected and popular herb world wide. 

  • Used in the natural treatment of cystitis and bladder infections
  • Recommended for kidney infections and prostatitis
  • A useful natural diuretic and systemic detox agent
  • Known to relieve gout and inflammation
  • A concentrated 100% natural whole herb tincture which is vegan friendly 

Ingredients

Inala Health Buchu is a 100% natural concentrated full spectrum extract of Agathosma betulina. Ingredients: Agathosma betulina, Aqua, Ethanol (natural preservative and extracting agent)

Directions for use: Dilute in a little water or juice

Children under 12 years: 1 drop per age year of the child three times daily
Adults: 15 - 20 drops three times daily
Caution: Please consult your doctor should symptoms persist. Safety during pregnancy and breastfeeding has not been established. Please keep this and all medicines out of reach of children. 

    Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.

entry.title: Inala Health Stronga for Men (Umondi) - Libido Tonic
entry.summary:
Vendor: Natural Wholesalers
Type: Natural Remedy Capsule
Price: 146.50

Stronga: Umondi Libido Tonic for Men(60 capsules)

Mondia whitei (also known as White's Ginger, Umondi or Mundondo) is a very popular African herb with a wide variety of medicinal uses, the most well-known being as a libido and fertility tonic for men 

  • Traditionally used as an aphrodisiac and libido tonic
  • Promotes male fertility and supports healthy testosterone levels
  • Helps to improve appetite, ease digestion and relieve abdominal pains
  • Also used as a mood tonic and to relieve stress
  • Contains vitamns A, D, K and E as well as magnesium, zinc, iron, calcium and protein and is therefore also used as a strengthening tonic
  • Vegan & vegetarian friendly (veggie tablets) in a recyclable glass bottle

Ingredients

Inala Health Stronga Capsules (contain 100% pure Mondia whitei powder in a vegan friendly capsule.

Directions for use

Use 2 -3 capsules twice daily.
Caution: Please consult your doctor should symptoms persist. Please keep this and all medicines out of reach of children. 

    Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.

entry.title: Inala Health Artemisia/Bitter Melon Capsules
entry.summary:
Vendor: Natural Wholesalers
Type:
Price: 152.50

Artemisia & Bitter Melon for sugar balance (60 capsules)

Artemisia (also known as Lengana or Wilde Als) has traditionally been used as a treatment for malaria, respiratory conditions, diabetes and to strengthen the immune system. Inala Health combines Artemisia with Bitter Melon, a traditional treatment for sugar balance as a strengthening tonic for people with diabetes

  • Artemisia is traditionally used for a range of ailments from coughs, colds, fever, loss of appetite, colic, headache, intestinal worms, diabetes & malaria. 
  • Bitter melon has been studied for its use in maintaining balanced blood sugar levels in the treatment of diabetes
  • The ideal supplement for people with diabetes looking for an immune system and respiratory tonic
  • Vegan & vegetarian friendly (veggie tablets) in a recyclable glass bottle

Ingredients

Inala Health Artemisia/Bitter Melon capsules (450 mg) contain:

Artemisia afra (Lengana,Wildeals), Momordica charantia  (Bitter melon), in a vegan friendly capsule

Directions for use

Children over 12 years: 1 capsule twice daily
Adults: 2 capsules twice daily
Caution: Please consult your doctor should symptoms persist. Safety during pregnancy and breastfeeding has not been established. Please keep this and all medicines out of reach of children. 

    Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.

entry.title: Inala Health Pure Artemisia Capsules
entry.summary:
Vendor: Natural Wholesalers
Type:
Price: 146.50

Pure Artemisia Herb in capsule form (60 capsules)

This super-herb has traditionally been used as a treatment for malaria, respiratory conditions, fever and as a digestive tonic. Recently Artemisia (also known as Lengana or Wilde Als) has grabbed the spotlight and is currently undergoing trials that suggest that it may show promise in the treatment and prevention of Covid-19. 

Benefits of Artemisia

  • Artemisia has many traditional uses, and is used for a range of ailments from coughs, colds, fever, loss of appetite, colic, headache, earache, intestinal worms to malaria. 
  • Our capsules contain 100% pure powdered Artemisia herb with no fillers or artificial ingredients
  • As Artemisia herb is very bitter, taking it in capsule form is more palatable and more convenient for people who do not like the bitter taste
  • Artemisia is also traditionally used to support sugar balance
  • Vegan & vegetarian friendly (veggie tablets) in a recyclable glass bottle
  • Made in South Africa to reduce YOUR carbon footprint!

Ingredients

100% pure powdered Artemisia affra in a vegan friendly capsule

Directions

Children over 12 years: 1 capsule twice daily
Adults: 2 capsules twice daily
Caution: Please consult your doctor should symptoms persist. Safety during pregnancy and breastfeeding has not been established. Please keep this and all medicines out of reach of children. 
Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.
